medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain, diarrhea, fevers, and anorexia.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began four days ago with muscle aches. The next day, he experienced diffuse lower abdominal pain, fevers up to 102.2Â°F, shaking chills, and diarrhea. He was unable to tolerate oral intake. Yesterday at 3 PM, the pain migrated to the right lower quadrant (RLQ), and the pain, anorexia, and fevers have persisted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, hypothyroidism, gastroesophageal reflux, obstructive sleep apnea, chronic back pain.
medical_history.family_history: Crohn's disease in first and second-degree relatives.
